description: Malik`s alternate personality and a psychopath who loves killing his opponents. He was created by his host`s hatred of the tombkeeper`s life, Yami Malik first appears after Malik is forced to undergo the painful initiation ritual passed down through his family. The dark half fed on his misery until one day, when Malik was about to punished for going above ground, he took over both Malik`s body and the Millennium Rod and brutally stabbed Malik`s father to death.
name: Yami no Malik
